title: Next Jhin Skin
body:
I want a skin to be made that is a cross between Hannibal Lecter and Jhin{{champion:202}}. They both wear masks, they are both sociopaths, and they both enjoy the art of killing. Sorry Riot, but the cowboy skin is lame and annoying. Lets see a skin that actually makes sense for my 4 shot wonder.

I'm not sure how far Riot would be able to go of course. Licensing and rights can be a nuisance.

Any time Elise shows up "Hello Elise"

replies.body: What would Nightmare Jhin encapsulate? Im thinking he looks like a the puppet in Saw, and rides around on a tricycle.
tricycle as his homegaurd animation definitely. and that concept isnt too far off, he does have alot of traps. but they gotta make the mask super creepy
